description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: This resource provides the status of the payment for goods and services rendered, and the request and response resource references.

ruleset.description: The version of the style of resource contents. This should be mapped to the allowable profiles for this and supporting resources.

originalRuleset.description: The style (standard) and version of the original material which was converted into this resource.

created.description: The date when this resource was created.

targetIdentifier.description: The Insurer who is target  of the request.

targetReference.description: The Insurer who is target  of the request.

providerIdentifier.description: The practitioner who is responsible for the services rendered to the patient.

providerReference.description: The practitioner who is responsible for the services rendered to the patient.

organizationIdentifier.description: The organization which is responsible for the services rendered to the patient.

organizationReference.description: The organization which is responsible for the services rendered to the patient.

responseIdentifier.description: Reference of response to resource to reverse.

responseReference.description: Reference of response to resource to reverse.

paymentStatus.description: The payment status, typically paid: payment sent, cleared: payment received.

statusDate.description: The date when the above payment action occurrred.
